Title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in oro/platform.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.1.0 before 3.1.29, all versions starting from 4.1.0 before 4.1.17, all versions starting from 4.2.0 before 4.2.8
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.1.0, all versions starting from 3.1.29 before 4.1.0, all versions starting from 4.1.17 before 4.2.0, all versions starting from 4.2.8
